posts.text:
å”¯ä¸€ä¸€åœºæ¯é“é¢˜éƒ½æœ‰æ€è·¯çš„æ¯”èµ›ï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰è¿˜è¡Œï¼Œè™½ç„¶æœ‰æ€è·¯ä¸ä»£è¡¨èƒ½ACï¼Œä¸è¿‡è¿˜æ˜¯å¾ˆå¼€å¿ƒçš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºé™¤äº†Eé¢˜çš„æ¡¶æ²¡æƒ³åˆ°å¤–å…¶ä»–éƒ½æ˜¯è‡ªåŠ›æ›´ç”Ÿåšå‡ºæ¥çš„ğŸ˜Š A Sum of Round Numbers åˆ†æ ç­¾åˆ°é¢˜ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯éå†æ•°çš„æ¯ä¸€ä½ï¼Œæ±‚å‡ºé0çš„ä½æ•°æœ‰å‡ ä½ï¼Œç„¶åintä¸€ä¸ªv=1ï¼Œä¹‹åæ²¡èµ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°v*=10ï¼Œç„¶åå½“ä¸€ä½æ•°ä¸ç­‰äº0æ—¶å°±ä¹˜ä¸Švå°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œè¿™é“é¢˜ç”¨å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åº”è¯¥æ›´ç®€å•ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘æƒ³è¯•è¯•ç”¨whileï¼Œç»ƒç»ƒæ‰‹ CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4+100; int main() { ios; int t,k; cin>>t; while(t--){ cin>>k; int cnt=0,x=k,v=1; while(k/10){ int tt=k%10; if(tt!=0) cnt++; k/=10; } cout<<cnt+1<<endl; while(x/10){ int tt=x%10; if(x/10&&tt!=0) cout<<tt*v<<" "; x/=10; v*=10; } cout<<(x%10)*v<<endl; } return 0; } B - Same Parity Summands åˆ†æ è¿™é“é¢˜æ˜¯ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªaå’Œbï¼Œè®©ä½ ç”¨bä¸ªåŒä¸ºå¶æ•°æˆ–è€…å¥‡æ•°çš„æ•°åŠ èµ·æ¥ç­‰äºaï¼Œè¾“å‡ºè¿™äº›æ•°ï¼Œåˆšå¼€å§‹æˆ‘ä¸€ç›´åœ¨æ‰¾è§„å¾‹ï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰å¾ˆéº»çƒ¦ï¼Œæ‰¾äº†åŠå°æ—¶ä¹Ÿæ²¡æ¶µç›–æ‰€æœ‰æƒ…å†µï¼Œåæ¥å‘ç°ç›´æ¥æš´åŠ›æšä¸¾å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æç«¯ï¼Œå½“éƒ½ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œè®©é™¤äº†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä»¥å¤–çš„æ•°éƒ½æ˜¯1ï¼Œç„¶åæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°=a-(b-1)ï¼ŒåŠ èµ·æ¥æ­£å¥½ç­‰äºaï¼ŒåŒç†éƒ½ä¸ºå¶æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œè®©é™¤äº†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä»¥å¤–çš„æ•°å…¨éƒ¨å˜æˆ2ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºn-2*(k-1)ï¼Œæ¡ä»¶éƒ½ä¸ç¬¦åˆè¾“å‡ºNOæƒ³é€šè¿™ä¸ªå°±ACäº† CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4+100; int main() { ios; int t,k,n; cin>>t; while(t--){ cin>>n>>k; int m=n-(k-1); if(m>0&&m%2){ cout<<"YES"<<endl; for(int i=0;i<k-1;i++){ cout<<1<<" "; } cout<<m<<endl; continue; } m=n-2*(k-1); if(m>0&&m%2==0){ cout<<"YES"<<endl; for(int i=0;i<k-1;i++){ cout<<2<<" "; } cout<<m<<endl; continue; } cout<<"NO"<<endl; } return 0; } C - K-th Not Divisible by n åˆ†æ çœ‹é¢˜ç›®å°±çŸ¥é“å¤§æ„ï¼Œä¸è¢«næ•´é™¤çš„ç¬¬Kä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆæˆ‘ä»¬æ¸…æ¥šè¢«Næ•´é™¤çš„æ•°ä¹‹é—´çš„æ•°æ•°é‡ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚èƒ½æ•´é™¤8çš„ï¼š8 16 24â€¦æ•°ä¹‹é—´éƒ½ç›¸å·®8ï¼Œé‚£è¿™å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰¾è§„å¾‹å˜›ï¼Œç”¨â€œ%â€æ‰¾åˆ°è¯¥æ•°åœ¨ä¸€æ®µåŒºé—´çš„é‚£ä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼Œç„¶åç”¨â€œ/â€æ‰¾åˆ°åœ¨ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªåŒºé—´å°±è¡Œäº† CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4+100; int main() { ios; int t,k,n; cin>>t; while(t--){ int a,b; cin>>a>>b; int k=b%(a-1); if(k==0){ cout<<(b/(a-1)*a)-1<<endl; } else cout<<(b/(a-1)*a)+k<<endl; } return 0; } D. Alice, Bob and Candies åˆ†æ è¿™é“é¢˜å¥½é•¿å•Šï¼Œæˆ‘ç¬¬ä¸€çœ¼å°±è¢«å“ä½äº†ï¼Œä¸æˆ˜è€Œå±ˆäººä¹‹å…µï¼Œä¸è¿‡ç‹ ä¸‹å¿ƒæ¥è¯»ä¸€è¯»ï¼Œå‘ç°å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒå‘æŒ‡é’ˆå¾€ä¸­é—´åˆæ‹¢ï¼Œå¥½åƒè¿™å«åŒå‘é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå†å¤šå®šä¹‰å‡ ä¸ªå˜é‡è®°å½•æ¯æ¬¡æ¯ä¸ªäººåƒå¤šå°‘ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªäººä¸Šæ¬¡åƒäº†å¤šå°‘ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¨¡æ‹Ÿï¼Œåªè¦èƒ½å†™å¯¹æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå°±èƒ½ACäº† CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4; int val[MAXN]; int main() { ios; int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ int n,pa=0,pb=0,flg=0;; cin>>n; int sum=0; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ cin>>val[i]; sum+=val[i]; } int ea=0,eb=0,cnt=1,sa,sb,head=1,tail=n; while(tail-head>=0){ sa=0; sb=0; if(flg==0&&sum-ea-eb>pb){ while(sa<=pb){ sa+=val[head]; ea+=val[head]; head++; } pa=sa; flg=1; cnt++; continue; } if(flg==1&&sum-ea-eb>pa){ while(sb<=pa){ sb+=val[tail]; eb+=val[tail]; tail--; } pb=sb; flg=0; cnt++; continue; } cnt++; if(flg==0){ ea+=sum-ea-eb; break; }else{ eb+=sum-ea-eb; break; } } cout<<cnt-1<<" "<<ea<<" "<<eb<<" "<<endl; } return 0; } åŒå‘é˜Ÿåˆ—è¶…çº§ç®€å•ï¼Œæ°´é¢˜ #include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; typedef long long ll; deque<int> dq; int main() { int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ dq.clear(); int n; cin>>n; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ int temp; cin>>temp; dq.push_back(temp); } ll pa=0,pb=0,suma=0,sumb=0,res=1,ansa=0,ansb=0,cnt=0; while(!dq.empty()){ cnt++; suma=sumb=0; if(res&1){ while(suma<=pb&&!dq.empty()){ suma+=dq.front(); dq.pop_front(); } ansa+=suma; pa=suma; }else{ while(sumb<=pa&&!dq.empty()){ sumb+=dq.back(); dq.pop_back(); } ansb+=sumb; pb=sumb; } res++; } cout<<cnt<<" "<<ansa<<" "<<ansb<<endl; } return 0; } E. Special Elements åˆ†æ æœ€å¥½ç†è§£çš„ä¸€é“é¢˜ç›®ğŸŒä¹Ÿæ˜¯æˆ‘å”¯ä¸€ä¸€é“çœ‹äº†é¢˜è§£çš„é¢˜ç›®ğŸ˜‚ä¸€ä¸ªå‰ç¼€å’Œï¼Œè¿™é“é¢˜æ•°æ®é‡å¾ˆå°ï¼Œåªæœ‰8000ï¼Œç›´æ¥è£…è¿›æ¡¶é‡Œå°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œè€Œæˆ‘å°±æ˜¯æ²¡æƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œä¸€ç›´åœ¨çº ç»“æ€ä¹ˆé™ä½å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼ˆå¥½èœå•Šï¼‰æ±‚å‡ºæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´çš„å’Œçœ‹çœ‹è¿™ä¸ªå’Œå¯¹åº”çš„æ¡¶ç¼–å·é‡Œé¢è£…æ²¡è£…æ•°ï¼Œå…¶å®æ˜¯é“æ°´é¢˜ CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4; int val[MAXN],book[MAXN]; int main() { ios; int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ memset(book,0,sizeof book); memset(val,0,sizeof val); int n; cin>>n; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ cin>>val[i]; book[val[i]]++; val[i]+=val[i-1]; } int cnt=0; for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++){ for(int j=i+2;j<=n;j++){ int sum=val[j]-val[i]; // cout<<sum<<' '<<book[sum]<<endl; if(sum<=n&&book[sum]){ cnt+=book[sum]; book[sum]=0; } } } cout<<cnt<<endl; } return 0; } F - Binary String Reconstruction åˆ†æ åˆæ˜¯æ€ç»´é¢˜ï¼Œç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªn0,n1,n2è®©ä½ æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒè¿›åˆ¶åºåˆ—ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªåºåˆ—å­åºåˆ—ä¸­00çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºn0ï¼Œ01æˆ–10çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºn1ï¼Œ11çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºn2ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆn0å’Œn2çš„åºåˆ—å®¹æ˜“æ„é€ ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåªåŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å­—ï¼Œn1æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰é¡ºåºä¸º1010â€¦n1=1:10 n1=2:101 n1=3:1010ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå•ç‹¬æ„é€ å®¹æ˜“ï¼Œåˆèµ·æ¥éš¾ï¼Œä¸‰ä¸ªåºåˆ—åˆèµ·æ¥ä¸­é—´è‚¯å®šä¼šå¤šå‡ºä¸€äº›ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åªè¦åœ¨æœ¬ä¸Šæ¼”ç®—ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå†æŠŠå¤šå‡ºçš„é‚£ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†å»æ‰å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘æ„é€ çš„åºåˆ—é¡ºåºæ˜¯n0n2n1ï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰è¿™æ ·æ„é€ ç®€å•ğŸ¶è¯´å®è¯æˆ‘äº¤ä»£ç æ—¶éƒ½æ²¡æ•¢æƒ³èƒ½ACï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ„Ÿè§‰æ²¡è€ƒè™‘å…¨ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æµ‹è¯•å‡ ç»„æ•°æ®å‘ç°èƒ½è¿‡å°±æŠ±ç€è¯•ä¸€è¯•çš„æ€åº¦äº¤ä¸Šå»äº†ï¼Œç»“æœAäº†ğŸ˜„ CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4; int val[MAXN],book[MAXN]; int main() { ios; int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ int n0,n1,n2; string ans; cin>>n0>>n1>>n2; for(int i=1;i<=n0+1;i++){ if(n1!=0||n1==0&&n2==0) ans+="0"; } for(int i=1;i<=n2;i++){ ans+="1"; } for(int i=1;i<=n1;i++){ if(i%2) ans+="1"; else ans+="0"; } if(n0==0&&n1==0) ans+="1"; cout<<ans<<endl; } return 0; } G - Special Permutation åˆ†æ è¯´å®è¯æˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥é“è¿™é“é¢˜ä¸ºå•¥æ”¾åœ¨æœ€åï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰éš¾åº¦å¹¶ä¸å¤§ï¼Œåè€ŒæŒºç®€å•çš„ğŸŒšå°±æ˜¯è®©ä½ æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªç›¸é‚»ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ä¹‹å·®çš„ç»å¯¹å€¼åœ¨2åˆ°4çš„åŒºé—´å†…ï¼ˆé—­åŒºé—´ï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªè¦æŠŠå¥‡å¶åˆ†å¼€å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç–‘é—®ï¼Œæˆ‘çš„æ€è·¯æ˜¯æŠŠå¶æ•°å†™åœ¨å‰é¢å¥‡æ•°çš„å€’åºåˆ—æ”¾åœ¨åé¢ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š 8ï¼š2 4 6 8 7 5 3 1 å¾ˆæ˜æ˜¾åªæœ‰ä¸­é—´ä¸ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åªåŠ¨ä¸­é—´å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œè®©7å’Œ5ï¼ˆå¥‡æ•°åºåˆ—çš„å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªï¼‰äº¤æ¢ï¼š 8ï¼š2 4 6 8 5 7 3 1ï¼ˆæ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ï¼‰ å†ä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼š 9ï¼š2 4 6 8 9 7 5 3 1 è¿˜æ˜¯åªåŠ¨ä¸­é—´ï¼Œå› ä¸º9æ¯”8ï¼ˆå¥‡æ•°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå’Œå¶æ•°æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªï¼‰å¤§æ‰€ä»¥è®©5è·‘åˆ°9ä¸­é—´ï¼ˆå¥‡æ•°ç¬¬3ä¸ªç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å¥‡æ•°å’Œå¶æ•°åºåˆ—ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰ï¼š 9ï¼š2 4 6 8 5 9 7 3 1ï¼ˆæ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ï¼‰ è¿™æ ·çš„æ€è·¯æˆ‘ä»”ç»†æƒ³äº†æƒ³æ„Ÿè§‰æ²¡æ¯›ç—…ï¼Œå°±äº¤äº†ï¼Œç»“æœwrongäº†ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä¸æœæ°”ï¼Œå‘ç°ä¸­é—´å¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ¢è¡Œçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œåˆäº¤åˆwrongâ€¦ æˆ‘æ¯äº†ï¼Œä¸ºå•¥ï¼Ÿ åæ¥æ¢æ€è·¯ï¼š ç»™2 4 1 3çš„åºåˆ—ä¸¤è¾¹æ·»åŠ æ•°ï¼Œå…ˆå·¦åå³è½®æ¢æ·»åŠ ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š 8ï¼š2 4 1 3 8ï¼š5 2 4 1 3 8ï¼š5 2 4 1 3 6 8ï¼š7 5 2 4 1 3 6 8ï¼š7 5 2 4 1 3 6 8 å®Œæˆ~ï¼Œäº¤äº†ACäº†ã€‚ã€‚ACåçœ‹äº†æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®å‘ç°æˆ‘åŸæ¥çš„ä»£ç æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®1åº”è¯¥æ˜¯å¯¹çš„å•Šï¼å¸Œæœ›ç½‘å‹é‚£ä½å¯ä»¥ä¸ºæˆ‘è§£æƒ‘ï¼ˆä¸èƒœæ„Ÿæ¿€ï¼‰ wrong CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string> #include<string.h> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(0) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4; void swap(int &a,int &b){ int t=a; a=b; b=t; } int val[MAXN],book[MAXN]; int main() { ios; int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ memset(val,0,sizeof val); int n; cin>>n; if(n==2||n==3){ cout<<-1<<endl; continue; } int tail=0; for(int i=2;i<=n;i+=2){ val[++tail]=i; } int flag=tail; int p=n%2?n:n-1; for(int i=p;i>=1;i-=2){ val[++tail]=i; } if(val[flag+1]<val[flag]) swap(val[flag+1],val[flag+2]); else{ for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ if(i==flag+1){ printf("%d%c",val[flag+3],i==n?'
':' '); } if(i==flag+3){ continue; } printf("%d%c",val[i],i==n?'
':' '); } if(n==5) cout<<endl; continue; } for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) printf("%d%c",val[i],i==n?'
':' '); } return 0; } AC CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<string> #include<string.h> #include<algorithm> #include<iostream> using namespace std; string ans; void bd(int n){ if(n<=9){ ans=(char)(n+'0')+ans; }else{ while(n!=0){ char c=(char)(n%10+'0'); ans=c+ans; n/=10; } } } void pd(int n){ if(n<=9){ ans+=(char)(n+'0'); }else{ char ch[2000]; int tail=0; while(n!=0){ char c=(char)(n%10+'0'); ch[++tail]=c; n/=10; } for(int i=tail;i>=1;i--){ ans+=ch[i]; } } } int main() { int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ ans.clear(); int n; cin>>n; if(n<=3){ puts("-1"); continue; } ans+="2 4 1 3"; int flag=1; for(int i=5;i<=n;i++){ if(i%2){ ans=" "+ans; bd(i); } else{ ans+=" "; pd(i); } } cout<<ans<<endl; } Ending~æ’’èŠ± ä¸è¦ç™½å«–äº†ï¼Œç•™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèµå§ğŸ‘

posts.text:
åˆå¹¶æ•°å­— é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ è¿™é“é¢˜ç”¨æ ˆæ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸€ä¸‹å°±è¡Œäº† CODE #include<iostream> #include<cstdio> #include<cmath> #include<cstring> #include<algorithm> #include<vector> #include<stack> using namespace std; int main() { stack<int> s; int n,cnt=0; cin>>n; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ int t; cin>>t; while(s.size()&&s.top()-t==1){ cnt++; s.pop(); } if(s.size()&&t-s.top()==1) cnt++; else s.push(t); } cout<<cnt<<endl; } REd AND BLACK é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„DFS CODE #include<iostream> #include<stdio.h> #include<string> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; char s[30][30]; int m,n,sum; int dfs(int x,int y){ if(x+1>n||x+1<1||y+1>m||y+1<1) return 0; if(s[x][y]=='#') return 0; else{ s[x][y]='#'; return 1+dfs(x+1,y)+dfs(x-1,y)+dfs(x,y+1)+dfs(x,y-1); } } int main() { while(scanf("%d %d",&m,&n)!=EOF){ if(m==0&&n==0) break; sum=0; for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ scanf("%s",s[i]); } for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ for(int j=0;j<m;j++){ if(s[i][j]=='@'){ sum=dfs(i,j); goto skip; } } } skip:printf("%d
",sum); } } æ£‹ç›˜é—®é¢˜ é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ æ°´é¢˜ï¼ŒDFSè¿‡äº† CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<string.h> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; char map[9][9]; int vis[50],n,k,ans; void dfs(int m,int x) { if(x==k) { // printf("%d
",m); ans++; return ; } for(int i=m;i<=n;i++) for(int j=0;j<n;j++) { if(map[i][j]=='.'||vis[j]==1) continue; vis[j]=1; dfs(i+1,x+1); vis[j]=0; } } int main() { while(~scanf("%d%d",&n,&k)) { if(n==-1&&k==-1) break; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) scanf("%s",&map[i]); memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis)); ans=0; dfs(1,0); printf("%d
",ans); } return 0; } F - Super Jumping! Jumping! Jumping!(é‡è¦) é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ æœ€å¤§ä¸Šå‡å­åºåˆ—ï¼Œå¼€ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„æ²¡ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å­˜å‚¨çš„å€¼ä»£è¡¨è¿™ä¹‹å‰æœ€å¤§çš„åºåˆ—é•¿åº¦ï¼Œç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¼¼å†’æ³¡æ’åºçš„æ¯”è¾ƒæ¥æ›´æ–°å½“å‰å€¼å°±è¡Œäº† CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<string.h> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; typedef long long ll; const int N=1e6; ll sum[N],arr[1010],n,m; int main() { while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF){ if(n==0) break; memset(sum,0,sizeof sum); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) scanf("%d",&arr[i]); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ for(int j=0;j<i;j++){ if(arr[i]>arr[j]) sum[i]=max(sum[i],sum[j]+arr[i]); } } ll mx=0; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ mx=max(mx,sum[i]); } printf("%lld
",mx); } return 0; } H - WeirdSort(é‡è¦) é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ ç•¥ CODE #include<iostream> #include<cstdio> #include<cmath> #include<cstring> #include<algorithm> #include<vector> using namespace std; const int MAXN=200; int a[MAXN],p[MAXN],a1[MAXN]; void swap(int &a,int &b){ int t=a; a=b; b=t; } int main() { int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ int m,n; cin>>m>>n; for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){ cin>>a[i]; a1[i]=a[i]; } for(int j=1;j<=n;j++) cin>>p[j]; sort(p+1,p+1+n); int flag=0; while(1){ int flag=0; int cnt=1; for(int i=cnt;i<=n;i++){ // cout<<"i="<<i<<endl; if(a[p[i]]>a[p[i]+1]){ swap(a[p[i]],a[p[i]+1]); flag=1; } } if(flag==0) break; } sort(a1+1,a1+1+m); for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){ if(a1[i]!=a[i]){ flag=1;break; } } if(flag==1) printf("NO
"); else printf("YES
"); } } Integer Divisibility (é‡è¦ä½™æ•°æ–¹é¢) é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ é‡è¦çš„å°±æ˜¯ä¸€å¥ä»£ç ï¼šans%=n;å°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¸€å¥ä½“ç°äº†åŒä½™åŸç†ï¼Œé¿å…äº†å¤§æ•´æ•°æº¢å‡º CODE #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; int main(){ int n,m,t; long long ans; cin>>t; int sum=0; while(t--){ cin>>n>>m; ans=m; int s=0; while(ans%n!=0){ ans=ans*10+m; //cout<<ans<<endl; ans%=n; //æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç  s++; } cout<<"Case "<<++sum<<": "<<++s<<endl; } } Pieï¼ˆå®æ•°åŒºé—´ä¸Šçš„äºŒåˆ†ï¼‰ é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ è¿™é“é¢˜ä¸çœ‹é¢˜è§£å¾ˆéš¾æƒ³åˆ°ç”¨äºŒåˆ†å»åšï¼Œæˆ‘ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡åšè¿™é“é¢˜è¿˜æ˜¯æ²¡æƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œä¸€åªå†æ‰¾è§„å¾‹ï¼Œå…¶å®è¿™é“é¢˜æ˜¯æ‰¾å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´ï¼Œåœ¨åŒºé—´å†…äºŒåˆ†æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å¤§çš„æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„å€¼ï¼Œä¸è¿‡éœ€è¦zhidaæ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯åœ¨å®æ•°åŒºé—´ä¸ŠäºŒåˆ†æ¯æ¬¡ä¸èƒ½l=mid+1æˆ–è€…r=mid-1ï¼Œä»¥åŠäºŒåˆ†æ¡ä»¶å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¯¯å·®å€¼:r-l>è¯¯å·®å€¼ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰å¦‚ä½•åˆ’åˆ†ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼šæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªè›‹ç³•ä½“ç§¯é™¤ä»¥midå°±æ˜¯è¯¥è›‹ç³•æœ€å¤šåˆ†é…ç»™å¤šå°‘äººï¼Œæ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªå’Œå¦‚æœè¯¥å’Œå¤§äº(f+1)å°±è¡¨ç¤ºæ»¡è¶³äº†æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œç»§ç»­å¾€å³æ‰¾ğŸ‘‰ï¼Œç›´åˆ°ä¸æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºæ­¢ï¼Œå½“ä¸æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶å°±éœ€è¦å‡å°‘midçš„å€¼å¾€å·¦æ‰¾ğŸ‘ˆï¼Œå‡å°‘æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªäººåˆ†åˆ°çš„è›‹ç³•æ•° CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<string.h> #define pi acos(-1) using namespace std; const int MAXN=1e4+100; double a[MAXN]; int main() { int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ memset(a,0,sizeof a); int n,f; cin>>n>>f; double sum=0; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ int tt; cin>>tt; a[i]=pi*tt*tt; sum+=a[i]; } double l,r,mid; l=0; r=sum/(f+1); while(1e-5<r-l){ int sum2=0; mid=(l+r)/2; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ sum2+=(int)(a[i]/mid); //åˆ¤æ–­åˆ’åˆ†åè¯¥å–å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†è¿˜æ˜¯ååŠéƒ¨åˆ† } if(sum2>=(f+1)){ l=mid; }else{ r=mid; } } printf("%.4lf
",mid); } return 0; } M - Complete the Sequenceï¼ˆé‡è¦ï¼‰ é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ è¿™é“é¢˜å…¶å®è§„å¾‹å¾ˆæ˜æ˜¾ï¼Œå¾ˆå®¹æ˜“å°±èƒ½æƒ³åˆ°æ±‚å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„ï¼ˆè·Ÿå·®åˆ†æ²¡æœ‰å…³ç³»ï¼‰ï¼Œå‰ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼å‡å»å½“å‰å€¼å‚¨å­˜åˆ°æ–°æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå€’ä¸‰è§’ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å€’ä¸‰è§’çš„åº•éƒ¨ï¼Œç„¶åå¾€å³å¤åˆ¶cä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå†å¾€ä¸Šæ¨å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å®ç°ä»£ç æ¯”è¾ƒæ•°æ®å…³ç³»æ¯”è¾ƒè´¹è„‘ï¼Œå›¾ï¼š <% fb_img https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/uncleacc/img/sucai/2.png %> CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<string.h> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; const int MAXN=110; int a[MAXN][MAXN]; int main() { int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ int n,c; cin>>n>>c; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ cin>>a[0][i]; } int cnt=1; for(int i=1;i<n;i++){ for(int j=1;j<=n-cnt;j++){ a[i][j]=a[i-1][j+1]-a[i-1][j]; } cnt++; } for(int i=1;i<=c;i++){ a[n-1][i+1]=a[n-1][i]; } for(int j=1;j<=c;j++){ cnt=j+1; for(int i=n-1;i>0;i--){ a[i-1][cnt+1]=a[i][cnt]+a[i-1][cnt]; cnt++; } } for(int i=1;i<=c;i++){ printf("%d%c",a[0][n+i],i==c?'
':' '); } } return 0; } N - Harmonic Number(é‡è¦) é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ åˆ†æ è¿™é“é¢˜å«æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé‡è¦æ€æƒ³å°±æ˜¯ï¼šå½“æˆ‘ä»¬å¼€ä¸äº†å¾ˆå¤§çš„æ•°ç»„å‚¨å­˜è®¸å¤šæ•°æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ¯ä¸€ç™¾ä¸ªæˆ–äº”åä¸ªå»å‚¨å­˜ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ€æƒ³å¾ˆé‡è¦ï¼Œå½“æ—¶å°±æ²¡æƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œæƒ³åˆ°äº†å°±æ˜¯æ°´é¢˜ä¸€é“äº† CODE #include<stdio.h> #include<string.h> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; #define N 1123456 #define M 100000005 double a[N]; void init() { double sum=0; int z=1; a[0]=0; for(int i=1;i<M;i++) { sum+=(1.0/i); if(i%100==0) a[z++]=sum; } } int main() { int n,m; init(); scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) { scanf("%d",&m); int x=m/100; double ans=a[x]; for(int i=x*100+1;i<=m;i++){ ans+=(1.0/i); } printf("Case %d: %.10lf
",i,ans); } return 0; }

posts.title: hexoå†™ä½œæ ‡ç­¾

"æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨å†™ä½œæ—¶ä¸åªæ˜¯éœ€è¦å¥½çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œç®€æ´ç¾ä¸½çš„é¡µé¢ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰€è¦è¿½æ±‚çš„ï¼Œç®€æ´çš„é¡µé¢èƒ½å¤Ÿä½¿è¯»è€…æ›´å®¹æ˜“çœ‹æ‡‚ï¼Œç»“æ„æ›´æ¸…æ™°ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬å°±éœ€è¦ä¸€äº›æ ‡ç­¾æ¥è¾…åŠ©æˆ‘ä»¬å†™ä½œï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹è½¬è½½äº" https://cndrew.cn/2020/04/18/mdjj/ ä¸‹é¢åªæ˜¯æˆ‘çš„ä¸€äº›è®°å½•ä¹Ÿç®—æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æ¼”ç¤ºï¼Œéœ€è¦JSå’ŒCSSæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå…·ä½“å‚è€ƒåŸæ–‡ JS å¤åˆ¶ä¸‹é¢ä»£ç åˆ°JSæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œåœ¨../node_modules/hexo-generator-tag/index.jsä¸­è°ƒç”¨ function postFolding(args, content) { args = args.join(' ').split(','); let style = '' let title = '' if (args.length > 1) { style = args[0].trim() title = args[1].trim() } else if (args.length > 0) { title = args[0].trim() } if (style != undefined) { return `<details ${style}><summary> ${hexo.render.renderSync({text: title, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')} </summary> <div class='content'> ${hexo.render.renderSync({text: content, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')} </div> </details>`; } else { return `<details><summary> ${hexo.render.renderSync({text: title, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')} </summary> <div class='content'> ${hexo.render.renderSync({text: content, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')} </div> </details>`; } } hexo.extend.tag.register('folding', postFolding, {ends: true}); function postP(args) { args = args.join(' ').split(',') let p0 = args[0].trim() let p1 = args[1].trim() return `<p class='p ${p0}'>${p1}</p>`; } function postSpan(args) { args = args.join(' ').split(',') let p0 = args[0].trim() let p1 = args[1].trim() return `<span class='p ${p0}'>${p1}</span>`; } hexo.extend.tag.register('p', postP); hexo.extend.tag.register('span', postSpan); function postNote(args) { args = args.join(' ').split(',') if (args.length > 1) { let cls = args[0].trim() let text = args[1].trim() return `<div class="note ${cls}">${hexo.render.renderSync({text: text, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')}</div>`; } else if (args.length > 0) { let text = args[0].trim() return `<div class="note">${hexo.render.renderSync({text: text, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')}</div>`; } } function postNoteBlock(args, content) { return `<div class="note ${args.join(' ')}"> ${hexo.render.renderSync({text: content, engine: 'markdown'}).split('
').join('')} </div>`; } hexo.extend.tag.register('note', postNote); hexo.extend.tag.register('noteblock', postNoteBlock, {ends: true}); CSS å¤åˆ¶CSSä»£ç åœ¨head.ejsæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¼•ç”¨ç‚¹å‡»æˆ‘ posts.text: STL next_permutationå‡½æ•°å®ç° åŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ æŒæ¡äº†next_permutationå‡½æ•°çš„åŸç†ğŸ˜„ void inline swap(char *s1,char *s2){ char t=*s1; *s1=*s2; *s2=t; } /** *åè½¬å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‡½æ•°,s,eåˆ†åˆ«æ‰§è¡Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„å¼€å§‹å’Œç»“å°¾ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åè½¬ä¸­æ–‡ **/ void reverse(char *s,char* e){ for(e--;s<e;s++,e--)swap(s,e); } bool next_permutation(char *start,char *end){ char *cur = end-1, *pre=cur-1; while(cur>start && *pre>=*cur)cur--,pre--; if(cur<=start)return false; for(cur=end-1;*cur<=*pre;cur--);//æ‰¾åˆ°é€†åºä¸­å¤§äº*preçš„å…ƒç´ çš„æœ€å°å…ƒç´  swap(cur,pre); reverse(pre+1,end);//å°†å°¾éƒ¨çš„é€†åºå˜æˆæ­£åº return true; } prev_permutationåªè¦å°†ä¸Šé¢çš„curå’Œpreä½œæ¯”è¾ƒçš„åœ°æ–¹æ¢ä¸€ä¸‹ä½ç½®å°±è¡Œäº† bool prev_permutation(char *start,char *end){ char *cur = end-1, *pre=cur-1; while(cur>start && *pre<=*cur)cur--,pre--;//è¿™é‡Œç¬¦å·æœ‰å˜åŒ– if(cur<=start)return false; for(cur=end-1;*cur>=*pre;cur--);//è¿™é‡Œç¬¦å·æœ‰å˜åŒ– swap(*cur,*pre); reverse(pre+1,end); return true; } ä¾‹é¢˜ ç»™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²Sï¼ˆå¯èƒ½æœ‰é‡å¤çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼‰ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§å­—å…¸åºä»å°åˆ°å¤§ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºSåŒ…æ‹¬çš„å­—ç¬¦ç»„æˆçš„æ‰€æœ‰æ’åˆ—ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šS = â€œ1312â€ï¼Œ è¾“å‡ºä¸ºï¼š 1123 1132 1213 1231 1312 1321 2113 2131 2311 3112 3121 3211 Sample Input 1312 Sample Output 1123 1132 1213 1231 1312 1321 2113 2131 2311 3112 3121 3211 CODE #include<cstdio> #include<cstring> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; bool next_permutation(char *start,char *end){ char *cur = end-1, *pre=cur-1; while(cur>start && *pre>=*cur)cur--,pre--; if(cur<=start)return false; for(cur=end-1;*cur<=*pre;cur--);//æ‰¾åˆ°é€†åºä¸­å¤§äº*preçš„å…ƒç´ çš„æœ€å°å…ƒç´  swap(*cur,*pre); reverse(pre+1,end);//å°†å°¾éƒ¨çš„é€†åºå˜æˆæ­£åº return true; } int main(){ char s2[100]; scanf("%s",s2); int n=strlen(s2); sort(s2,s2+n); do{ puts(s2); // cnt++; }while(next_permutation(s2,s2+n)); // printf("%d",cnt); } DFS #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> #include<cstring> using namespace std; const int N = 10+5; char ch[N]; char ans[N]; bool vis[N]; int n; void dfs(int x){ int i; if(x == n){ printf("%s\n",ans); }else{ for(int i = 0; i < n;i++){ if(vis[i] == false){ vis[i] = true; ans[x] = ch[i]; dfs(x+1); vis[i]=false; //ç­›é™¤é‡å¤æ•°æ® while(i < n-1 && ch[i+1]==ch[i]) i++; } } } } int main() { scanf("%s",&ch); n = strlen(ch); sort(ch,ch+n); dfs(0); return 0; }

posts.title: Simple String Queriesã€æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ã€‘
posts.text: é¢˜ç›® Simple String Queries Problem Statement You are given a string S of length N consisting of lowercase English letters. Process Q queries of the following two types: Type 1 : change the iq-th character of S to cq. (Do nothing if the iq-th character is already cq .) Type 2 : answer the number of different characters occurring in the substring of S between the lq-th and rq-th characters (inclusive). Constraints N, Q, iq, lq, and rq are integers. S is a string consisting of lowercase English letters. cq is a lowercase English letter. 1â‰¤Nâ‰¤500000 1â‰¤Qâ‰¤20000 |S|=N 1â‰¤iqâ‰¤N 1â‰¤lqâ‰¤rqâ‰¤N There is at least one query of type 2 in each testcase. Input Input is given from Standard Input in the following format: N S Q Query1â‹® QueryQ Here, Queryi in the 4-th through (Q+3)-th lines is one of the following: 1 iq cq 2 lq rq Output For each query of type 2, print a line containing the answer. Sample Input 1 7 abcdbbd 6 2 3 6 1 5 z 2 1 1 1 4 a 1 7 d 2 1 7 Sample Output 1 3 1 5 In the first query, cdbb contains three kinds of letters: b , c , and d, so we print 3 . In the second query, S is modified to abcdzbd. In the third query, a contains one kind of letter: a, so we print 1 . In the fourth query, S is modified to abcazbd. In the fifth query, S does not change and is still abcazbd. In the sixth query, abcazbd contains five kinds of letters: a, b, c, d, and z, so we print 5 . æ€è·¯ åˆšåšè¿™é“é¢˜å°±çœ‹å‡ºæ¥è¦ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘åªåšè¿‡æ¨¡æ¿é¢˜ï¼Œæƒ³äº†å¥½ä¹…æ‰åšäº†å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´çš„æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„æ¥å‚¨å­˜å½“å‰ä½ç½®ä¹‹å‰æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­—æ¯çš„æ•°é‡ï¼Œä¸€ç»´è¡¨ç¤º26ä¸ªå­—æ¯ï¼ŒäºŒç»´è¡¨ç¤ºæ•°é‡ Code #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<stdlib.h> #include<string.h> #include<string> #define ios ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0) using namespace std; typedef long long ll; const int maxn=5e5+100; char ch[maxn]; int n,arr[27][maxn]; int lowbit(int n){ return n&-n; } void update(int p,int t,int a[]){ for(int i=p;i<=n;i+=lowbit(i)){ a[i]+=t; } } ll getsum(int p,int a[]){ ll ans=0; for(int i=p;i>0;i-=lowbit(i)){ ans+=a[i]; } return ans; } int main() { int m; cin>>n; scanf("%s",ch+1); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ update(i,1,arr[ch[i]-'a']); //æ›´æ–°å½“å‰ä½ç½®å­˜å‚¨çš„å½“å‰ä½ç½®ä¹‹å‰çš„æŸä¸€ä¸ªå­—æ¯æ•°é‡ } cin>>m; for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){ int t; cin>>t; if(t==1){ char c; int p; cin>>p>>c; update(p,-1,arr[ch[p]-'a']); //å°†å½“å‰ä½ç½®å­˜å‚¨çš„å­—æ¯æ•°é‡å‡ä¸€ ch[p]=c; //è®°å¾—æ›´æ–°chæ•°ç»„ update(p,1,arr[c-'a']); } if(t==2){ ll sum=0,x,y; cin>>x>>y; for(int i=0;i<26;i++){ sum+=getsum(y,arr[i])-getsum(x-1,arr[i])>0; //26ä¸ªå­—æ¯åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªåŒºé—´çš„æ•°é‡è‹¥å¤§äº0ï¼Œåˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºå­˜åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªå­—æ¯ï¼ŒsumåŠ ä¸€ } cout<<sum<<endl; } } return 0; }

posts.text: é¢˜ç›® problem link å¯æ€œçš„å…¬ä¸»åœ¨ä¸€æ¬¡æ¬¡è¢«é­”ç‹æ³èµ°ä¸€æ¬¡æ¬¡è¢«éª‘å£«ä»¬æ•‘å›æ¥ä¹‹åï¼Œè€Œä»Šï¼Œä¸å¹¸çš„å¥¹å†ä¸€æ¬¡é¢ä¸´ç”Ÿå‘½çš„è€ƒéªŒã€‚é­”ç‹å·²ç»å‘å‡ºæ¶ˆæ¯è¯´å°†åœ¨Tæ—¶åˆ»åƒæ‰å…¬ä¸»ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä»–å¬ä¿¡è°£è¨€è¯´åƒå…¬ä¸»çš„è‚‰ä¹Ÿèƒ½é•¿ç”Ÿä¸è€ã€‚å¹´è¿ˆçš„å›½ç‹æ­£æ˜¯å¿ƒæ€¥å¦‚ç„šï¼Œå‘Šæ‹›å¤©ä¸‹å‹‡å£«æ¥æ‹¯æ•‘å…¬ä¸»ã€‚ä¸è¿‡å…¬ä¸»æ—©å·²ä¹ ä»¥ä¸ºå¸¸ï¼Œå¥¹æ·±ä¿¡æ™ºå‹‡çš„éª‘å£«LJè‚¯å®šèƒ½å°†å¥¹æ•‘å‡ºã€‚ ç°æ®å¯†æ¢æ‰€æŠ¥ï¼Œå…¬ä¸»è¢«å…³åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªä¸¤å±‚çš„è¿·å®«é‡Œï¼Œè¿·å®«çš„å…¥å£æ˜¯Sï¼ˆ0ï¼Œ0ï¼Œ0ï¼‰ï¼Œå…¬ä¸»çš„ä½ç½®ç”¨Pè¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œæ—¶ç©ºä¼ è¾“æœºç”¨#è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œå¢™ç”¨è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œå¹³åœ°ç”¨.è¡¨ç¤ºã€‚éª‘å£«ä»¬ä¸€è¿›å…¥æ—¶ç©ºä¼ è¾“æœºå°±ä¼šè¢«è½¬åˆ°å¦ä¸€å±‚çš„ç›¸å¯¹ä½ç½®ï¼Œä½†å¦‚æœè¢«è½¬åˆ°çš„ä½ç½®æ˜¯å¢™çš„è¯ï¼Œé‚£éª‘å£«ä»¬å°±ä¼šè¢«æ’æ­»ã€‚éª‘å£«ä»¬åœ¨ä¸€å±‚ä¸­åªèƒ½å‰åå·¦å³ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œæ¯ç§»åŠ¨ä¸€æ ¼èŠ±1æ—¶åˆ»ã€‚å±‚é—´çš„ç§»åŠ¨åªèƒ½é€šè¿‡æ—¶ç©ºä¼ è¾“æœºï¼Œä¸”ä¸éœ€è¦ä»»ä½•æ—¶é—´ã€‚ Input è¾“å…¥çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡ŒCè¡¨ç¤ºå…±æœ‰Cä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®çš„å‰ä¸€è¡Œæœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªæ•´æ•°Nï¼ŒMï¼ŒTã€‚ Nï¼ŒMè¿·å®«çš„å¤§å°NMï¼ˆ1 <= N,M <=10)ã€‚Tå¦‚ä¸Šæ‰€æ„ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹å»çš„å‰NMè¡¨ç¤ºè¿·å®«çš„ç¬¬ä¸€å±‚çš„å¸ƒç½®æƒ…å†µï¼ŒåNMè¡¨ç¤ºè¿·å®«ç¬¬äºŒå±‚çš„å¸ƒç½®æƒ…å†µã€‚ Output å¦‚æœéª‘å£«ä»¬èƒ½å¤Ÿåœ¨Tæ—¶åˆ»èƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°å…¬ä¸»å°±è¾“å‡ºâ€œYESâ€ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¾“å‡ºâ€œNOâ€ã€‚ Sample Input 1 5 5 14 S#. .#â€¦ â€¦ ****. â€¦#. â€¦.P #.â€¦ **â€¦ â€¦. *.#â€¦ Sample Output YES è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼šç±»ä¼¼äºä¸‰ç»´ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä½†å®Œå…¨å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„åšï¼Œæ ‡è®°ä¸€ä¸‹åœ¨å“ªä¸€å±‚å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚æ³¨æ„ä¸¤å±‚åŒä¸€ä½ç½®éƒ½æ˜¯ä¼ è¾“æœºçš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šé€ æˆæ— é™å¾ªç¯ã€‚ Code #include<iostream> #include<cstring> #include<cmath> using namespace std; int ex,ey,ez; int n,m,t,flag,T; int d[4][2]={1,0,-1,0,0,-1,0,1}; int vis[15][15][15]; char a[15][15][15]; void dfs(int x,int y,int z,int step){ if(flag) return ; if(x==ex&&y==ey&&z==ez){ if(step<=T){ flag=1; } return ; } if(step>=T) return ; for(int i=0;i<4;i++){ int dx=x+d[i][0]; int dy=y+d[i][1]; int dz=z; if(dx>=0&&dx<n&&dy>=0&&dy<m&&!vis[dz][dx][dy]&&a[dz][dx][dy]!='*'){ vis[dz][dx][dy]=1; if(a[dz][dx][dy]=='#'){ vis[abs(dz-1)][dx][dy]=1; dfs(dx,dy,abs(dz-1),step+1); vis[abs(dz-1)][dx][dy]=0; } else { dfs(dx,dy,dz,step+1); } vis[dz][dx][dy]=0; } } } int main(){ int t; cin>>t; while(t--){ memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis)); flag=0; cin>>n>>m>>T; for(int i=0;i<2;i++){ for(int j=0;j<n;j++){ for(int k=0;k<m;k++){ cin>>a[i][j][k]; if(a[i][j][k]=='P'){ ex=j,ey=k,ez=i; } } } } for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ for(int j=0;j<m;j++){ if(a[0][i][j]=='#'&&a[1][i][j]=='#'){//ä¸¤è¾¹éƒ½æ˜¯#çš„æƒ…å†µ ï¼Œä¼šé€ æˆæ— é™å¾ªç¯ vis[0][i][j]=vis[1][i][j]=1; } if(a[0][i][j]=='*'&&a[1][i][j]=='#'){ vis[0][i][j]=vis[1][i][j]=1; } if(a[0][i][j]=='#'&&a[1][i][j]=='*'){ vis[0][i][j]=vis[1][i][j]=1; } } } dfs(0,0,0,0); if(flag) cout<<"YES"<<endl; else cout<<"NO"<<endl; } return 0; }

posts.title: ç¦»æ•£åŒ–åŠ å·®åˆ†æ±‚è§£
posts.text: é¢˜ç›® Covered Points Count You are given n segments on a coordinate line; each endpoint of every segment has integer coordinates. Some segments can degenerate to points. Segments can intersect with each other, be nested in each other or even coincide. Your task is the following: for every kâˆˆ[1â€¦n] , calculate the number of points with integer coordinates such that the number of segments that cover these points equals k. A segment with endpoints li and ri covers point x if and only if liâ‰¤xâ‰¤ri. Input The first line of the input contains one integer n (1â‰¤nâ‰¤2â‹…105 ) â€” the number of segments. The next n lines contain segments. The i-th line contains a pair of integers li,ri (0â‰¤liâ‰¤riâ‰¤1018) â€” the endpoints of the i-th segment. Output Print n space separated integers cnt1,cnt2,â€¦,cntn, where cnti is equal to the number of points such that the number of segments that cover these points equals to i. Examples Input 3 0 3 1 3 3 8 Output 6 2 1 Input 3 1 3 2 4 5 7 Output 5 2 0 note The picture describing the first example: Points with coordinates [0,4,5,6,7,8] are covered by one segment, points [1,2] are covered by two segments and point [3] is covered by three segments. The picture describing the second example: Points [1,4,5,6,7] are covered by one segment, points [2,3] are covered by two segments and there are no points covered by three segments. åˆ†æ é¢˜ç›®å¤§æ„æ˜¯ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°nï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥æœ‰nç»„è¾“å…¥ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡éƒ½ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´ï¼ŒåŒºé—´ä¸Šçš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½è¢«è¦†ç›–ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œè¦ä½ è¾“å‡ºæœ€åè¦†ç›–äº†1 2 3â€¦â€¦æ¬¡çš„æ•°çš„æ•°é‡ å¾ˆå…¸å‹çš„ä¸€é“å·®åˆ†é¢˜ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡è¿™é“é¢˜æ•°æ®é‡å¾ˆå¤§(0â‰¤liâ‰¤riâ‰¤1018) ï¼Œå¼€ä¸äº†è¿™ä¹ˆå¤§çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ•°æ®é‡å¾ˆå° (1â‰¤nâ‰¤2â‹…105)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ç¦»æ•£åŒ–ï¼Œç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å‚¨å­˜æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡è¾“å…¥çš„å·¦æ®µç‚¹å’Œå³ç«¯ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠè¯¥æ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œæ’åºå»é‡ï¼Œå†å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œå·®åˆ†æ“ä½œï¼Œæœ€åå¯¹å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„æ±‚å‰ç¼€å’Œ code #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; typedef long long ll; const int maxn=2e5+100; struct node{ ll x,y; }p[maxn];ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å‚¨å­˜ç«¯ç‚¹å€¼ ll a[maxn<<1],b[maxn],c[maxn];//ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å‚¨å­˜ç¦»æ•£åŒ–åçš„å€¼ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å‚¨å­˜å·®åˆ†çš„å€¼,cæ•°ç»„ç”¨æ¥å­˜å‚¨æœ€åç»“æœ int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); int n,tail=0; cin>>n; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ cin>>p[i].x>>p[i].y; //è¾“å…¥å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹å’Œå³ç«¯ç‚¹ a[++tail]=p[i].x; //å­˜å…¥aæ•°ç»„ç”¨æ¥ç¦»æ•£åŒ– a[++tail]=p[i].y+1; } sort(a+1,a+1+tail); //æ’åº int len=unique(a+1,a+1+tail)-a-1; //å»é‡ for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ int x=lower_bound(a+1,a+1+len,p[i].x)-a; //åœ¨aæ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°æ¯ä¸€ç»„çš„å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹ä½ç½® int y=lower_bound(a+1,a+1+len,p[i].y+1)-a; //æ‰¾å³ç«¯ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½® b[x]++;b[y]--; //å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå·¦ç«¯ç‚¹++ï¼Œå³ç«¯ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®-- } for(int i=1;i<=len;i++){ b[i]+=b[i-1]; //æ±‚å‰ç¼€å’Œ c[b[i]]+=a[i+1]-a[i]; //cæ•°ç»„æ³¨æ„ç”¨long longï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä»£è¡¨ç€ä»a[i]å¼€å§‹åˆ°a[i+1]éƒ½æ˜¯è¢«æŸ“è‰²äº†b[i]æ¬¡ã€‚ } for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) printf("%lld%c",c[i],i==n?'\n':' '); } okï¼Œç»“æŸï¼Œåˆšæ¥è§¦çœŸçš„æ„Ÿè§‰å¥½æŠ½è±¡

",buffer); //è¾“å‡ºæ‰“å°buffer return 0;} OUTPUT: Enter a number: 1750 decimal: 1750 hexadecimal: 6d6 binary: 11011010110 æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ itoa() å‡½æ•°æœ‰3ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼šç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°æ˜¯è¦è½¬æ¢çš„æ•°å­—ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°æ˜¯è¦å†™å…¥è½¬æ¢ç»“æœçš„ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°æ˜¯è½¬ç§»æ•°å­—æ—¶æ‰€ç”¨çš„åŸºæ•°(è¿›åˆ¶)ã€‚åœ¨ä¸Šä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œè½¬æ¢åŸºæ•°ä¸º10ï¼Œå°±æ„å‘³ç€ä»¥10ä¸ºè½¬æ¢è¿›åˆ¶ã€‚10ï¼šåè¿›åˆ¶ï¼›2ï¼šäºŒè¿›åˆ¶â€¦ itoa å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡å‡†çš„Cå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯Windowsç‰¹æœ‰çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦å†™è·¨å¹³å°çš„ç¨‹åºï¼Œè¯·ç”¨sprintfã€‚ æ ‡å‡†åº“ä¸­æœ‰sprintfï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½æ¯”è¿™ä¸ªæ›´å¼ºï¼Œç”¨æ³•è·Ÿprintfç±»ä¼¼ï¼š char str[255]; sprintf(str, â€œ%xâ€, 100); //å°†100è½¬ä¸º16è¿›åˆ¶è¡¨ç¤ºçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚ ä¸‹åˆ—å‡½æ•°ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å°†ç›¸åº”ç±»å‹çš„æ•´æ•°è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼š å°†æ— ç¬¦å·æ•´å‹æ•°valueè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¹¶è¿”å›è¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²,radixä¸ºè½¬æ¢æ—¶æ‰€ç”¨åŸºæ•° char *ltoa(long value,char *string,int radix) å°†é•¿æ•´å‹æ•°valueè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¹¶è¿”å›è¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²,radixä¸ºè½¬æ¢æ—¶æ‰€ç”¨åŸºæ•° char *itoa(int value,char *string,int radix) å°†æ•´æ•°valueè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ä¸²å­˜å…¥string,radixä¸ºè½¬æ¢æ‰€ç”¨åŸºæ•°. double atof(char *nptr) å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²nptrè½¬æ¢æˆåŒç²¾åº¦æ•°,å¹¶è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªæ•°,é”™è¯¯è¿”å›0 int atoi(char *nptr) å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²nptrè½¬æ¢æˆæ•´å‹æ•°, å¹¶è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªæ•°,é”™è¯¯è¿”å›0 long atol(char *nptr) å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²nptrè½¬æ¢æˆé•¿æ•´å‹æ•°,å¹¶è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªæ•°,é”™è¯¯è¿”å›0 double strtod(char *str,char **endptr) å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²strè½¬æ¢æˆåŒç²¾åº¦æ•°,å¹¶è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªæ•°, long strtol(char *str,char **endptr,int base) å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²strè½¬æ¢æˆé•¿æ•´å‹æ•°, å¹¶è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªæ•° ok,åˆ11ç‚¹å¤šäº†ï¼Œå“ï¼å•¥ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯

posts.text: é¢˜ç›®æè¿° è¯·ä½ ç¼–ä¸€ç¨‹åºå®ç°ä¸¤ç§ä¸åŒè¿›åˆ¶ä¹‹é—´çš„æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ã€‚ è¾“å…¥æ ¼å¼ å…±ä¸‰è¡Œï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºéœ€è¦è½¬æ¢çš„æ•°çš„è¿›åˆ¶n(2â‰¤nâ‰¤16)n(2â‰¤nâ‰¤16)n(2â‰¤nâ‰¤16)ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒè¡Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªnè¿›åˆ¶æ•°ï¼Œè‹¥n>10n>10n>10åˆ™ç”¨å¤§å†™å­—æ¯Aâˆ’FA-FAâˆ’Fè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç 10âˆ’1510-1510âˆ’15ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¯¥nnnè¿›åˆ¶æ•°å¯¹åº”çš„åè¿›åˆ¶çš„å€¼ä¸è¶…è¿‡100000000010000000001000000000ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰è¡Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºè½¬æ¢ä¹‹åçš„æ•°çš„è¿›åˆ¶m(2â‰¤mâ‰¤16)m(2â‰¤mâ‰¤16)m(2â‰¤mâ‰¤16)ã€‚ è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼ ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºè½¬æ¢ä¹‹åçš„mmmè¿›åˆ¶æ•°ã€‚ è¾“å…¥è¾“å‡ºæ ·ä¾‹ è¾“å…¥ #1 16 FF 2 è¾“å‡º #1 11111111 ä»£ç ï¼š #include<iostream> #include<stdio.h> #include<algorithm> #include<string> #include<math.h> #include<vector> using namespace std; int change(char ch){ if(ch=='A') return 10; if(ch=='B') return 11; if(ch=='C') return 12; if(ch=='D') return 13; if(ch=='E') return 14; if(ch=='F') return 15; } char judge(int a){ if(a>=0&&a<=9) return char(a+'0'); if(a==10) return 'A'; if(a==11) return 'B'; if(a==12) return 'C'; if(a==13) return 'D'; if(a==14) return 'E'; if(a==15) return 'F'; } int main() { int n,m,i=0,cnt=0; long long sum=0; vector<int> arr; string num; cin>>m>>num>>n; for(int i=num.size()-1;i>=0;i--,cnt++){ if(num[i]>='A'&&num[i]<='F'){ int t=change(num[i]); sum+=t*pow(m,cnt); } else sum+=(num[i]-'0')*pow(m,cnt); } // cout<<sum<<endl; if(n==10) cout<<sum<<endl; else if(n>=2&&n<10||n>10&&n<=16){ string s=""; while(sum!=0){ s=judge(sum%n)+s; sum/=n; } cout<<s<<endl; } }

Two integers are said to be co-prime or relatively prime if they have no common positive divisors other than 1 or, equivalently, if their greatest common divisor is 1. The number 1 is relatively prime to every integer. Input The first line on input contains T (0 < T <= 100) the number of test cases, each of the next T lines contains three integers A, B, N where (1 <= A <= B <= 10^15) and (1 <=N <= 10^9). Output For each test case, print the number of integers between A and B inclusive which are relatively prime to N. Follow the output format below. Sample Input 2 1 10 2 3 15 5 Sample Output Case #1: 5 Case #2: 10 Hint In the first test case, the five integers in range [1,10] which are relatively prime to 2 are {1,3,5,7,9}. åŸç† å…ˆä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è¯´ç®—36,ä½ è¦æ€ä¹ˆç®—ï¼Œç”¨6ä¸ª6ç›¸ä¹˜å¯¹ä¸å¯¹ï¼Œé‚£è¦æ˜¯31000å‘¢ï¼Ÿ1000ä¸ª3ç›¸ä¹˜ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(N)ï¼Œç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬è¿™æ ·ç®—ï¼Œ6çš„äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ˜¯110ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥6=1(22)+1(21)+0(20)ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ36å°±å˜æˆäº†3^( 1(22)+1(21)+0(20) )=3(1*(22^)) * 3(1*(21)) * 3(0*(20))ï¼Œè¿™å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚çš„åŸç†ï¼Œçœ‹èµ·æ¥éº»çƒ¦äº†å¯¹å—ï¼ŸOKï¼Œå…ˆä¸çœ‹å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œå…ˆçœ‹ç”¨ä»£ç å¦‚ä½•å®ç°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ¥å……å½“3(1*(22))ã€3(1*(21))ã€3(0*(20))ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ä»£ç ä¸­yå°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡éƒ½è¦ç®—çš„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚3(0*(20))=1ï¼Œä¹˜ä¸ä¹˜éƒ½ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œé‚£æ€ä¹ˆåˆ¤æ–­å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬æ¯æ¬¡å–äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°çš„æœ€åä¸€ä½ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯0è¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯1ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯0ï¼Œå°±ä¸ç”¨ä¸ç”¨ä¹˜ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å°±ä¹˜ï¼Œå…ˆçœ‹ä»£ç ï¼š int p(int a,int b){ int t,y; //å®šä¹‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œtèµ·åˆ°ç±»ä¹˜çš„ä½œç”¨ï¼Œè€Œyåˆ™å°±æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡è¦ä¹˜çš„æ•° t=1; y=a; //æ³¨æ„ä¸€å®šè¦åˆå§‹åŒ– while (b!=0){ //åªè¦äºŒè¿›åˆ¶ä½æ•°è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰éå†å®Œå°±è¿˜è¦å¾ªç¯ if (b&1==1) t=t*y; //yå°±æ˜¯å¹‚çš„å½¢å¼a^(2^0),a^(2^1),a^(2^2),a^(2^3) y=y*y; // b=b>>1; //æ¯æ¬¡è¦èˆå»äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°çš„æœ€åä¸€ä½ } return t; } è¿™å°±æ˜¯åŸç†æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆç®€å•å‘¢ï¼ˆqwqï¼‰ å¤æ‚åº¦ ä¹Ÿè®¸ä½ ä¼šç–‘æƒ‘æ˜æ˜æ­¥éª¤å˜å¤šäº†æ€ä¹ˆä¼šå¿«äº†å‘¢ï¼Ÿè¿™åªæ˜¯ä½ çš„ç›´è§‚æ„Ÿè§‰ï¼Œä»£ç æ˜¯å˜é•¿äº†ï¼Œä½†æ¬¡æ•°ç¡®ç¡®å®å®å˜å°‘äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥çœ‹ä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ä¸»è¦å°±åœ¨äºå¾ªç¯ä¸Šï¼Œå¾ªç¯çš„æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯b!=0ï¼Œè€Œæ¯æ¬¡ä¸éƒ½è¦é™¤ä»¥2ï¼Œè®¾å¾ªç¯æ¬¡æ•°ä¸ºxï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ2x=bï¼Œx=log(2,b)ï¼Œå¾ªç¯é‡Œé¢è¿ç®—æ¬¡æ•°æœ€å¤šä¸º3æ¬¡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¤æ‚åº¦æœ€å¤§å°±æ˜¯3log(2,N)ï¼Œ3æ˜¯å¸¸æ•°ï¼Œå½“æ•°å€¼å¾ˆå¤§æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœç•¥ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºlog(2,N)ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå‡å¦‚ç®—210000ï¼Œå¸¸è§„éœ€è¦10000æ¬¡è¿ç®—ï¼Œè€Œå¿«é€Ÿå¹‚åªéœ€è¦14*3æ¬¡è¿ç®—ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆç¥å¥‡å‘¢ï¼Ÿ åº”ç”¨ å­¦ä¹ äº†è¿™ä¸ªç®—æ³•æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆç”¨å‘¢ï¼Ÿå®é™…ä¸Šå¿«é€Ÿå¹‚æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªéå¸¸å¸¸ç”¨çš„ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå®ƒç»å¸¸ä¸å…¶ä»–ç®—æ³•ä¸€èµ·æ··ç”¨ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æ¥è¯´å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚é€‚ç”¨äºæ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡æ•°éå¸¸é«˜çš„æ•°å¯¹æŸä¸ªæ•°çš„ä½™æ•°ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šé¢˜ç›®ï¼š ç°åœ¨æ˜ŸæœŸæ—¥ï¼Œé—®ï¼šå†è¿‡210000å¤©åæ˜ŸæœŸå‡ ï¼Ÿå­¦ä¹ äº†å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚è¿™ç§é¢˜å°±æ˜¯é€åˆ†é¢˜äº†ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å¯¹7å–ä½™å°±è¡Œäº† é¢˜ç›® é™„ä¸Šé“¾æ¥ï¼Œæœ‰å…´è¶£çš„å°ä¼™ä¼´å¯ä»¥å‰å¾€ç›¸å…³ç½‘ç«™åšä¸€ä¸‹ Fermat's theorem states that for any prime number p and for any integer a > 1, ap = a (mod p). That is, if we raise a to the pth power and divide by p, the remainder is a. Some (but not very many) non-prime values of p, known as base-a pseudoprimes, have this property for some a. (And some, known as Carmichael Numbers, are base-a pseudoprimes for all a.) Given 2 < p â‰¤ 1000000000 and 1 < a < p, determine whether or not p is a base-a pseudoprime. Input Input contains several test cases followed by a line containing "0 0". Each test case consists of a line containing p and a. Output For each test case, output "yes" if p is a base-a pseudoprime; otherwise output "no". Sample Input 3 2 10 3 341 2 341 3 1105 2 1105 3 0 0 Sample Output no no yes no yes yes ACä»£ç ï¼š #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; long long p(long long a,long long b){ long long t,y,n=b; t=1; y=a; while (b!=0){ if (b&1==1) t=t*y%n; y=y*y%n; b=b>>1; } return t; } int main() { long long m,n; while(scanf("%lld %lld",&m,&n)!=EOF){ if(m==0&&n==0) break; int flag=0; for(int i=2;i*i<=m;i++){ if(m%i==0){ flag=1; break; } } if(flag==0) cout<<"no"<<endl; else{ if(p(n,m)==n) cout<<"yes"<<endl; else cout<<"no"<<endl; } } } åœ°å€ï¼šhttp://poj.org/problem?id=3641 Rightmost Digit Given a positive integer N, you should output the most right digit of N^N. Input The input contains several test cases. The first line of the input is a single integer T which is the number of test cases. T test cases follow. Each test case contains a single positive integer N(1<=N<=1,000,000,000). Output For each test case, you should output the rightmost digit of N^N. Sample Input 2 3 4 Sample Output 7 6 â€‹ â€‹ Hint In the first case, 3 * 3 * 3 = 27, so the rightmost digit is 7. In the second case, 4 * 4 * 4 * 4 = 256, so the rightmost digit is 6. è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢æ¯”æ™®é€šçš„æœç´¢æ•ˆç‡è¦é«˜ï¼Œå·²ç»æœç´¢è¿‡çš„å°±ä¸ç”¨å†æœç´¢äº†ï¼Œæœ‰DPçš„æ€æƒ³.step[i][j] ä¿å­˜çš„æ˜¯å½“å‰åæ ‡i,jå¯ä»¥åˆ°è¾¾çš„æœ€å¤§è·ç¦»ï¼ˆä¸åŒ…æ‹¬è‡ªå·±ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚3 2 1ï¼Œå½“å‰æ˜¯3ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥åˆ°è¾¾çš„æœ€å¤§è·ç¦»ä¸º2ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªåæ ‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸Šä¸‹å·¦å³å››ä¸ªæ–¹å‘æœç´¢ï¼Œå–è·ç¦»æœ€å¤§çš„é‚£ä¸ªï¼Œä½œä¸ºè¯¥åæ ‡çš„step[][]ã€‚è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢è¿™é‡Œä½“ç°çš„å°±æ˜¯å½“æœç´¢åˆ°æŸä¸€ä¸ªåæ ‡æ—¶ï¼Œè¯¥åæ ‡çš„step[][]å·²ç»æœ‰å€¼ï¼ˆæœç´¢è¿‡äº†ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸”è‚¯å®šæ˜¯æœ€ä¼˜çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç›´æ¥è¿”å›è¯¥step[][]å€¼å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚ ä»£ç ï¼š #include<stdio.h> #include<iostream> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; const int maxn=110; int map[maxn][maxn]; int step[maxn][maxn]; int Next[][2]={{1,0},{0,1},{-1,0},{0,-1}}; int m,n; int judge(int x,int y){ if(x>=0&&x<m&&y>=0&&y<n) return 1; else return 0; } int dfs(int x,int y){ if(step[x][y]) return step[x][y]; for(int i=0;i<4;i++){ int tx=x+Next[i][0]; int ty=y+Next[i][1]; if(judge(tx,ty)&&map[tx][ty]<map[x][y]){ int temp=dfs(tx,ty)+1; step[x][y]=max(temp,step[x][y]); } } return step[x][y]; } int main() { int ans=0; cin>>m>>n; for(int i=0;i<m;i++){ for(int j=0;j<n;j++){ cin>>map[i][j]; } } for(int i=0;i<m;i++){ for(int j=0;j<n;j++){ step[i][j]=dfs(i,j); if(ans<step[i][j]) ans=step[i][j]; } } cout<<ans+1<<endl; } posts.text: ä»Šå¤©å­¦ä¹ äº†æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ï¼Œè§‰å¾—è¿™ä¸€ç« è®²çš„ç‰¹åˆ«å¥½ï¼Œè¿æˆ‘è¿™ä¹ˆç¬¨çš„äººéƒ½çœ‹æ‡‚äº†ï¼Œç›¸ä¿¡æ‚¨ä¹Ÿä¸€å®šèƒ½çœ‹æ‡‚ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘å°±æƒ³æŠŠå®ƒåˆ†äº«å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œè‡³äºä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸è‡ªå·±å†™ï¼Œæˆ‘è§‰å¾—åŸæ–‡æ›´åŠ å®¹æ˜“ç†è§£ï¼ˆç»å¯¹ä¸æ˜¯å› ä¸ºæˆ‘æ‡’å“ˆï¼‰ï¼Œè¯´åˆ°è¿™é‡Œå¿…é¡»åæ§½ä¸€ä¸‹WPSï¼ŒæŠŠå›¾è½¬åŒ–æˆWordè¿˜è¦å……é’±ï¼Œè¿˜é‚£ä¹ˆè´µï¼Œå“åªèƒ½æ€ªæˆ‘æœ¬äººå¤ªç©·ï¼ŒåºŸè¯å°‘è¯´ï¼Œè´´å›¾å§ okï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆè¯¦ç»†å‘¢ï¼Œå¤§åŠ›æ¨èå•Šå“ˆç®—æ³•è¿™æœ¬ä¹¦ï¼Œè®²çš„çœŸçš„å¾ˆå¥½ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘æŠŠç¬¬äºŒé“é¢˜çš„ä»£ç è´´å‡ºæ¥å§ï¼Œæˆ‘è§‰å¾—è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€é“éå¸¸ç»å…¸çš„DFSæ¨¡æ¿é¢˜ï¼Œä¾¿äºæ‚¨å¤åˆ¶ï¼ˆå°½ç®¡æ‚¨ä¸éœ€è¦ï¼‰ #include<iostream> #include<stdio.h> #include<algorithm> using namespace std; int Min=99999,m,n,tx,ty; int next[4][2]={{1,0} , {0,1} , {-1,0} , {0,-1}},a[100][100]; int vis[100][100]; void dfs(int x,int y,int step){ int temp_x=x,temp_y=y; if(x==tx&&y==ty){ if(step<Min) Min=step; return ; } for(int i=0;i<=3;i++){ x=temp_x+next[i][0]; y=temp_y+next[i][1]; if(x<1||y<1||x>m||y>n) continue; if(!a[x][y]&&!vis[x][y]){ vis[x][y]=1; dfs(x,y,step+1); vis[x][y]=0; } } return; } int main() { cin>>m>>n; int sx,sy; for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){ for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){ cin>>a[i][j]; } } cin>>sx>>sy>>tx>>ty; vis[sx][sy]=1; dfs(sx,sy,0); cout<<Min<<endl; }
